language.entry: Hollow

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.

We... I... do not belong to this world...

EXEDO
VACUUM
FUTILIS
Hee hee... My whim grows stronger.
Soul of the fallen, withdraw from this vessel!
Attack first the evil that is within yourself, afore attacking the evil outside.
There is still time until the eternal abyss. Embrace your mortality.
*cackle*
Your soul is mine!
I can taste your life waning.
When the wind blows, the grass bends!
My power cannot be fathomed!
You are not a worthy vessel.
Can you feel it? That is your death.
I won't leave...
N-no, stay with me...
Alas, I am one, and I am no longer.
We will decide our own fate!
We have endured worse.
Oblivion shall not embrace us today!
There is nothing to be feared here but us!
Strike it as it winces!
There is always opportunity in the midst of chaos!
We will share our power with you!
Can you feel that? Use it.
Through trials we are polished!
Your decay strengthens our growth.
I beg of you, let me go!
Wh-why is it so dark in here!
P-Please no more! I don't want to die here!
*sob* I want out!
Do not leave me to die!
Get out of my head! Now!
Wh-who are you people? Leave me be!
You've brought me here to die, haven't you?
Don't be deceived! They can taste our fear!
Make the screaming stop! Please!
I deserve this...I know it.
Show me no mercy! Tear this flesh asunder!
Free me from this prison! Strike me down!
To suffer is to embrance oneself!
Hurt me more! I need to feel alive again!
Forfeit your life for something greater!
You can make me suffer no longer!
You are all pathetic curs!
Unhand me you uncultured swines!
My whim shall conquer yours!
I do not belong to you or anyone anymore!
You will set me free. Now!

Kill me...Please!

I...I am no longer myself!

There are teeth behind every smile!
I can't fight it much longer!
TURN BACK! WE NEED TO GO BACK!
I do not know where I am! SOMEONE HELP ME!
Don't leave me to die! Not again!
D-don't touch me! Stay away!
They are coming for me! Look at their eyes!

Rip me apart! I need it!
I've never felt pain quite like this before. MORE!

Make me stronger! Make me IMMORTAL!

All shall belong to me!
You shall imprison me no longer!

*cackle* YES! MORE!
*cough* *cough* That felt good.

*gasp* Whatever will happen to me?

Give it back, that was mine!
No, you destroyed it! How am I to feed now!
Do that again and you shall take it's place!

You only made it angrier!
I know you're just pretending!

way to squander a good meal.

I won't serve as bait!
Look! This is all my blood! *giggle*

No no no no! It will escape like this!
Hey, no cutting in line!
This would only make it stronger!
I won't fall for it again!
And spoil the tension? I don't think so.

That would prove to be futile.
Waste it not on me. I deserve this.
No, no, the other thing!
THE VESSEL IS UNWILLING.
That's not medicine!
This will not work on me anymore!
Fool me once...
But that would STOP the pain!
No, you can do worse than that!
RAVISH THIS BATTERED BODY
There is no life to be restored here.
We'll all die anyway.
I'd much rather be put down.
*giggle* That tickles!
A little precocious aren't we?
THIS VESSEL IS DECAYED.
That wouldn't do any good!
You can't make me go back! No!
Like I would believe you.
No, make it worse!
THE PAIN IS TOO SOOTHING TO SPOIL IT!
That's the wrong one!
I do not deserve such kindness.
I will struggle no longer...
I-I'm no warrior! Please!

RAAAAAAAGH I WON'T LET YOU!
*cackle* I'm almost free!
M-my power! It wavers!
Such demonic cacophonia!
No! No! I wish to forget! No more!
D-do you need a hug?
I do not know where we are, but I believe in you!
Would you care for a dance?
I know a family recipe just for that!
Twenty needles should be plenty for this.

I am not lying, it was a miniature tree! And it was most beautiful.
C-can I have some of that? I've never seen anything quite like it.
This vessel is more than enough. For now.
This tetric landscape will be new grave.
H-how did I get here? How do I leave?
C-can't we just forget all about this and go home?
You take me for a fool?
No, no, no! I will only drink from my flask!
I can see your eyes locking on to me. Stay. AWAY.
*groan* This fire burns quite nicely!
Tie me down and pour the boiling water!
How about we extinguish this fire?
Remember that you will die.
Begone you incompetent fool!
Bring me an opium pipe!
I grow tired. Goodnight.
That's not good enough.
I don't want to.
No...You will only make it come back.
This way is for the best.
N-no! I don't know you!

You feel it too, don't you? It feeds on your soul.

*gasp* D-don't startle me like that!
N-no! Please just don't hit me again!
You will not deceive me again!
You conspire with it, don't you?! Begone!
You cannot mend the unwilling vessel.
To bleed is to purify one self of weakness.
Such meek resolve is truly pitiable.
Just try me one more time, I dare you.
It is not nearly enough! The hunger is great!
Not enough. How about your next?
That won't work. Tried it before.
Leave me to perish, I more than deserve as such.
This fire burns too bright, extinguish it at once!
THE VESSEL CANNOT BE MENDED BY SUCH TRIFLE.
It smells funny. I'll pass.
*cough* *cough* What is this rubbish?!
No, the hunger only motivates me!
No! It needs to suffer as much as I have!
My gut contorts in such delightful ways!
I am not hungry... Not at all.
Would be wasted on one such as myself...
I would rather not, thank you...
ARE YOU INSANE? DON'T FEED IT!
Fool! This is isn't the nourishment I require!
Immortal ! A vessel ! WHAT AM I ?
Hollow

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.

这里没有任何一个人能看懂钉在她前额上的符纸，但似乎一直都在保养着以免它有任何损烂。该笔迹十分优雅，应该是来自外地。尝试拿掉那张符纸似乎会发生些…十分可怕的事情。那符纸看似是用来将魂体附身于那可怜的女孩，或者该说是那女孩的尸体。但事实恰恰相反，每次修补那符纸后，都觉得她内在愈来愈多东西。
没有人知道是什么让这人一次又一次来探险，但她在战斗的表现是不容置疑的。空壳似乎要不是被鲜血驱使就是响往着，就像饥饿的狼高兴地用血肉来温暖脖子一样。不知道怎么或为什么，她对生命精华的那种讽刺的玩弄，却能够使她的队友充满斗志，也能够用来使她的敌人腐化。每当她打倒敌人，你都在她脸上看到一丝可怖的笑容。
她是在一盒腐烂的小麦中被发现，似乎是隐藏着什么，或者被某人藏起来。要不是她一直以可怕的姿态晃动着，也许会把她错认为一个穿着异国服装的瓷娃娃。她的外表可能非常可爱，而且在她有回应时，她表现得非常健谈。然而，并不鼓励与她产生任何交谈，因为从她口中说出的语语都极为可怕。奇怪的是，那些话语跟她口形也不太符合。

Hollow

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.

No one around here can read what the ragged piece of paper crudely nailed to her forehead says, but it seems prudent not to let it turn to tatters. Such sublime and foreign pensmanship does not come cheap, and replacing it as well as the spike often proves to be a rather... gruesome affair. One would think such an esoteric talisman would be detaining whatever posesses the poor girl, if she is not a cadaver by now, but the opposite seems true. With each restoration, it feels more and more at home.

It is unknown what compells this one to embark on expeditions time and again, but her resourcefulness in the thick of battle and chaos is unquestionable. The Hollow seems driven, if not amused, by bloodshed in the same way a starving wolf is delighted to wrap its maws around a tender neck. Unbeknownst to us the how or why, her ironic manipulation of life's nectar allows her to invigorate her comrades, as well as rot her foes where they stand. Whenever one falls by her hand, you may just catch a glimpse of an unsightly grin.

This one was found in a box of rotten wheat, in hiding, or perhaps hidden by someone. Were it not for the disconcerting wobble when still, one would be forgiven to mistake her for a porcelain doll sporting little more than an exotic garb. Her appearence can be quite enticing, and, when responsive, she can be very talkative. Conversation is not encouraged, however, as the cacophonia unleashed from her agape lips can be quite overwhelming at best. Curiously though, they seldom match her words, when not entirely motionless.
